instructions.title: üìñ How to Use This App
instructions.step1: Enter a stock ticker in the sidebar (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, TSLA)
instructions.step2: Select date range for your backtest period
instructions.step3: Choose a trading strategy from the dropdown menu
instructions.step5: Click "Run Strategy" to see the results
instructions.us_stocks: US Stocks: Enter the ticker directly (e.g., `AAPL` for Apple, `GOOGL` for Google, `MSFT` for Microsoft)
instructions.non_us_stocks: Non-US Stocks: Add a country code suffix after the ticker:
instructions.cn_stocks: Chinese stocks: Add `.SS` for Shanghai or `.SZ` for Shenzhen (e.g., `600519.SS` for Kweichow Moutai, `000858.SZ` for Wuliangye)
instructions.hk_stocks: Hong Kong stocks: Add `.HK` (e.g., `0700.HK` for Tencent, `0005.HK` for HSBC)
instructions.sg_stocks: Singapore stocks: Add `.SI` (e.g., `D05.SI` for DBS Bank, `O39.SI` for OCBC)
instructions.jp_stocks: Japanese stocks: Add `.T` (e.g., `7203.T` for Toyota, `6758.T` for Sony)
instructions.crypto: ‚Çø Cryptocurrencies: Use the crypto symbol followed by your preferred currency (e.g., `BTC-USD` for Bitcoin, `ETH-USD` for Ethereum, `BTC-EUR` for Bitcoin in Euros)
instructions.not_sure: Not sure? Check [finance.yahoo.com](https://finance.yahoo.com) to find the correct ticker symbol
instructions.price_chart: Price Chart: Shows stock price with buy/sell signals marked
instructions.equity_curve: Equity Curve: Compares your strategy performance vs. buy & hold
instructions.metrics: Metrics: Total return, Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, and more
instructions.trades_table: Trades Table: Detailed list of all trades with entry/exit dates and returns
